document_data.name: Walker in the Mists
document_data.mainbody: The '''Walker in the Mists''' was a [[golem]] made from mist by Lord [[Erlan Duirsar]] of [[Evereska]] and the [[Greycloak Hills]].
document_data.Description: The golem was [[humanoid]] in shape but appeared to be made of solid mist.
document_data.Abilities: The Walker in the Mists had the same abilities as an [[iron golem]] but was not susceptible to rusting. Its body of "hard air" was very similar to the characteristics of a ''[[wall of force]]''.
document_data.Activities: Around [[1367 DR]], this golem accompanied various patrols by the [[elves]] of [[Greyhome]] around the Greycloak Hills.
